fields.Title of Presentation: Writing and Assessing Information Literacy Outcomes
fields.Description/Abstract: Many  universities are revising their curriculum guidelines to include  information literacy outcomes. How can subject classes meet these  outcomes without taking excessive time from the content, and how can the  results be effectively and efficiently measured? This breakout session  will cover the ACRL information literacy guidelines as well as subject  specific information literacy guidelines; writing measurable outcomes;  and using clickers to quickly and simply measure success.
